Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.libvirt.ErrorException 
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.libvirt.Connect.connectionVersion(Connect)
    Use Connect.getLibVersion() instead.
    org.libvirt.Error.getConn() 
    org.libvirt.Error.getDom() 
    org.libvirt.Connect.getHypervisorVersion(String)
    To get the version of the running hypervisor use Connect.getVersion() instead.
    org.libvirt.Connect.getLibVirVersion()
    use Library.getVersion() instead
    org.libvirt.Error.getNet() 
    org.libvirt.Connect.networkLookupByUUID(int[])
    use the UUIDString or UUID API.
    org.libvirt.Connect.storagePoolLookupByUUID(int[])
    Use the UUIDString or UUID APIs.
    org.libvirt.jna.Libvirt.virConnCopyLastError(ConnectionPointer, virError)
    as of libvirt 0.6.0, all errors reported in the per-connection object are also duplicated in the global error object. This method remains for backwards compatibility. Use Libvirt.virCopyLastError(org.libvirt.jna.virError) instead.
    org.libvirt.jna.Libvirt.virConnGetLastError(ConnectionPointer)
    as of libvirt 0.6.0, all errors reported in the per-connection object are also duplicated in the global error object. This method remains only for backwards compatibility. Use Libvirt.virGetLastError() instead.
